shopProducts.name: All t-Shirts & Accessories
shopProducts.description: The Gildan Ultra Cotton T-shirt is made from a substantial 6.0 cotton 6.0 oz. per sq. yd. fabric constructed from 100% cotton, this classic fit preshrunk jersey knit provides umatched comfort with each wear. Featuring a taped neck and shoulder, and a seemless double-needed collar, and avaliable in a range of colors, it offers it all in the ultimate head-turning package.
